attributes.action: ensure that the "killers" of baby p serve whole life tariffs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: baby peter died of horrific injuries,sustained while being "cared for" by his mother,her partner and their lodger,peter was known to & let down by,social services,and the doctors who repeatedly returned him to a life of torture.Even in death Peter has been let down yet again! we demand that those found guilty of "causing or allowing his death" serve full life sentences! they robbed an innocent child of his life and are going to serve a shorter time than burglars & fraudsters,lets show that a childs life is worth more than this.

rejection.details: As explained in our terms and conditions, we cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. That is a matter for direct communication with the Home Office. You may wish to sign this petition instead: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/childrendead/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
